item.title: Why Go Ignite Talk
item.description:
Why Go?

This is less a blog post and more a repository for my slides.

Background

I gave this talk on December 18th 2024 at the Orlando Devs Holiday Party.

Some Notes

As these are just the slides, you’re going to miss most of the content of the talk. But know that this is a very cursory introduction to Go. All of what I cover and more can be discovered on the Tour of Go. I wholly recommend you spend half an hour or so to complete that if you are interested in learning more about the Go syntax and features.
item.content:
Why Go?

This is less a blog post and more a repository for my slides.

Background

I gave this talk on December 18th 2024 at the Orlando Devs Holiday Party.

Some Notes

As these are just the slides, you’re going to miss most of the content of the talk. But know that this is a very cursory introduction to Go. All of what I cover and more can be discovered on the Tour of Go. I wholly recommend you spend half an hour or so to complete that if you are interested in learning more about the Go syntax and features.

Following Up

Please reach out if you want to learn more about Go or talk about Go-related things! The best way is to connect with me on LinkedIn.

The Slides

Here are my slides! The Gopher photos in the Mascot slide were taken from the Go blog and the backgrounds were made in Photopea using this image I found online.
